actions.text: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A055) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 172 (Roll no. 433).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Cartwright.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A055) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 172 (Roll no. 433).

description: At the end of division A (before the short title), insert the following:    Sec. 10004. None of the funds appropriated by this Act may be used to plan for, begin, continue, complete, process, or approve a public-private competition under the Office of Management and Budget Circular A-76.
purpose: An amendment numbered 43 printed in Part B of House Report 115-261 to prohibit the use of funds be used to plan for, begin, continue, complete, process, or approve a public-private competition to determine whether Federal civilian jobs should be outsourced.
